doc.title: Reflections: A Spring Break Fantasy
doc.plot: Great college days, 8 best friends, and an erotic weekend getaway. Two gay lovers reflect on the past and share their wild and erotic story of a Spring Break weekend getaway in this sexy movie about friendship, bonding and passion. With a magical backdrop, a cast of eight gorgeous performers, including rising star Kent Larson and a soundtrack that's as erotic as the movie, you're sure to place this one in your collection of all-time favorites.
